Title: Pass/Fail
Plot: Hiros life hangs in the balance as his brain tumor worsens, prompting him to subconsciously deal with some of his past decisions. Meanwhile, Sylar pays Claire an unexpected visit to get answers as to why he isn't quite himself. Elsewhere, Samuels plan to impress his long-lost love, Vanessa, takes a terrifying turn.
GuestStars: Madeline Zima, Dawn Olivieri, Lisa Lackey, Kate Vernon, Tamlyn Tomita, Danielle Savre, Sasha Pieterse, David Anders, George Takei, Sally Champlin, Mary Wickliffe, Helen Eigenberg, Jordon Dang, Satomi Okuno, Shevau
